title: ConnectWise Hit by Cyberattack; Nation-State Actor Suspected in Targeted Breach
description: ConnectWise, the developer of remote access and support software ScreenConnect, has disclosed that it was the victim of a cyber attack that it said was likely perpetrated by a nation-state threat actor.
